name: Mimecast
description: This app integrates with an instance of Mimecast to perform generic, investigative, and containment actions

password.description: Password of user to authenticate with

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Adds URL to a managed URL blacklist

match_type.description: Set to 'explicit' to block instances of the full URL or set to 'domain' to block any URL with the same domain

comment.description: Comment to add to blacklisted URL

example_values: Status: Successfully added URL to blacklist

actions.description: Add a sender or domain to a Mimecast group

member.description: Domain or Email address of a user to add to a group

id.description: Mimecast ID of the group to add to

example_values: Status: Successfully added member to group

actions.description: Remove a sender or domain from a Mimecast group

member.description: Domain or Email address of a user to remove from the group

id.description: Mimecast group ID to remove from

example_values: Status: Successfully removed member from group

actions.description: Blacklists a specific sender and recipient in Mimecast

sender.description: Email address of the sender to blacklist

actions.description: Whitelists a specific sender and recipient in Mimecast

sender.description: Email address of the sender to whitelist

actions.description: Adds URL to a managed URL whitelist

match_type.description: Set to 'explicit' to permit instances of the full URL or set to 'domain' to permit any URL with the same domain

comment.description: Comment to add to whitelisted URL

example_values: Status: Successfully added URL to whitelist

actions.description: Removes URL from a managed URL blacklist

example_values: Status: Successfully removed URL from URL Protection List
Successfully removed URL from URL Protection List

actions.description: Removes URL from a managed URL whitelist

id.description: URL ID to remove from whitelist

example_values: Status: Successfully removed URL from URL Protection List
Successfully removed URL from URL Protection List

actions.description: Lists all managed URLs from the black/white list
Lists all Mimecast groups matching the requested search criteria

source.description: A group source to filter on, either 'cloud' or 'ldap'

actions.description: Lists the members of a specified Mimecast group

id.description: Mimecast ID of the group to return

actions.description: Finds a member of a specified Mimecast group

type.description: The domain or email of the member to find

id.description: Mimecast ID of the group to search

actions.description: Get emails across the Mimecast platform
actions.verbose: Either from, to, subject, or sender_ip parameter must be filled out.

start.description: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS+0000 (Date and time of the earliest email to track)

end.description: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS+0000 (Date and time of the latest email to track)

message_id.description: Internet message ID of the message to track

sender_ip.description: Source IP address of email to track

from.description: Sending email address or domain of the emails to track

to.description: Recipient email address or domain of the emails to track

example_values: Message Hold Applied - Spam Signature policy

actions.description: Returns message information for a tracked email

id.description: Mimecast ID of the email to load

example_values: Message Hold Applied - Spam Signature policy
